A force field around </font><font color="#FFFF80">Vathael</font><font color="#C0C0C0"> flares, absorbing all damage. Liquid fire rains down on Inagin, broiling his flesh. Inagin screams as his entire left arm is reduced to ash. Liquid fire rains down on Jazella, broiling her flesh. Jazella screams as her entire right arm is reduced to ash. Inagin begins to sweat profusely in this sweltering heat. Jazella begins to sweat profusely in this sweltering heat. Jazella's skin and lips crack amid the heatwave. You smell burning flesh as a sheet of shimmering fire envelops Inagin. You smell burning flesh as a sheet of shimmering fire envelops Jazella. A burning salamander breathes a cloud of yellow air into the face of Inagin. Jazella is swarmed by several burning salamanders, setting her ablaze. A ball of wild fire smashes into Inagin, searing his flesh. A ball of wild fire smashes into Jazella, searing her flesh. Liquid fire rains down on Inagin, broiling his flesh. Inagin screams as his entire right arm is reduced to ash. Liquid fire rains down on Jazella, broiling her flesh. Inagin begins to sweat profusely in this sweltering heat. Jazella begins to sweat profusely in this sweltering heat. Inagin breathes in some black ashes and then begins coughing hoarsely. I’m going to assume Kuroi or whoever he is doesn’t play Lusternia anymore given their evident lack of understanding of Pyromancer demesnes. Given the fact that two amputated limbs prevent outrifting, coupled with the fact that Pyromancers are capable of delivering a critical warrior wound PASSIVELY within a matter of seconds. Oh, and not to mention that if a Pyromancer really wanted to be ridiculously stupid, they can instantly kill someone with one demesne tic and their Pheonix with Cremate after only ONE demesne tick. Yes, there is something wrong with Pyromancers and anyone who debates otherwise is a moron.

“Given the fact that two amputated limbs prevent outrifting”

This is why any combatant worth calling a combatant pre-outrifts herbs in a fight. Yes, the thing with the phoenix is ridiculous and needs changing, I’m not saying that. But that would also be something more than just the meld killing you, now wouldn’t it? Are Pyromancers strong? Yes. Should you die to only their meld? No.
